intro: I am a senior student at Loyola University New Orleans and a product design intern at Facebook.

Prior to my time at Facebook, I cofounded Lawn Chair, a software development studio, and worked as a freelance designer and web developer. Outside of the world of design, I have experience in web development and maintain several open source  libraries for React and Redux.
I am interested in working with passionate teams to build products with exceptional visual design, thoughtful user experience considerations, and a high degree of craftsmanship.
I expect to graduate in May 2018 as a Bachelor of Science in Design with University Honors, a minor in Art History, and a minor in Human-Computer Interaction.
